did.physdesc: This collection contains two items, newsclippings.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Atcheson L. Hench Autograph Collection, Accession # 6435-m, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: A gift of Mr. Hench on September 13, 1967

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two newsclippings, dated August 3, 1967; from the Charlottesville Daily Progressregarding letter 1960 Feb 4, Faulkner to Paul E. Pollard.
